creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
In a table with collapsing-border model, if a cell spans several rows, border
resolution is wrong between that cell and neighbour ones from the second row on.
Cells spanning several columns are ok, however.

creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 20412
Testcase showing the problem. The first table is wrong and broken tests are commented out. The second table is fine.

Hi Vincent,

Thanks for the bug report and the example. This got fixed in revision 594571 and
already existing testcases were updated accordingly.

Vincent
